entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:43 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 06:43 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
